<h1 id="åŸºäºsharpicoå¼€å‘å›¾ç‰‡è½¬icoå·¥å…·ç½‘ç«™">åŸºäºSharpIcoå¼€å‘å›¾ç‰‡è½¬ICOå·¥å…·ç½‘ç«™</h1>
<h1 id="sharpicoweb">SharpIcoWeb</h1>
<p><a href="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/bb4e5c0036a6a8cdbc59b38d44f09ad8f6dc722751dad34d3df5bf0ac61913c1/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f6c6963656e73652d4d49542d626c7565" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/bb4e5c0036a6a8cdbc59b38d44f09ad8f6dc722751dad34d3df5bf0ac61913c1/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f6c6963656e73652d4d49542d626c7565" alt="License" loading="lazy"></a></p>

<h2 id="é¡¹ç›®ä»‹ç»">ğŸ“é¡¹ç›®ä»‹ç»</h2>
<p><a href="https://github.com/ZyPLJ/SharpIcoWeb" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">SharpIcoWeb</a>æ˜¯åŸºäº<a href="https://github.com/star-plan/sharp-ico" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">SharpIco</a>å¼€å‘çš„å›¾ç‰‡è½¬ICOå·¥å…·ç½‘ç«™ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä¸Šä¼ pngã€jpgç­‰å›¾ç‰‡è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¤šå°ºå¯¸çš„Icoå›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨å‰åç«¯åˆ†ç¦»æŠ€æœ¯ã€‚</p>
<p>åç«¯æ¥å£ä½¿ç”¨ <code>.NET Minimal API</code>å¼€å‘ï¼Œå¤Ÿè½»é‡ã€‚</p>
<h2 id="é¢„è§ˆåœ°å€">ğŸ“é¢„è§ˆåœ°å€</h2>

<h2 id="åç»­æ›´æ–°">âœ…åç»­æ›´æ–°</h2>
<ul class="contains-task-list">
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" type="checkbox"><label> ä¸åŒå°ºå¯¸ICO,å¯åˆ†åˆ«ç”ŸæˆICOæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚</label></li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" type="checkbox"><label> å‰ç«¯æ˜¾ç¤ºICOæ–‡ä»¶å›¾æ ‡æ•°é‡æ•°æ®ã€å¤§å°ã€åç§»ç­‰æ•°æ®ã€‚</label></li>
<li class="task-list-item"><input class="task-list-item-checkbox" disabled="" type="checkbox"><label> æ‰¹é‡è½¬æ¢åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚</label></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹">ğŸš€å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹</h2>
<h3 id="dockeréƒ¨ç½²">Dockeréƒ¨ç½²</h3>
<p><font color="red">æ³¨æ„æ³¨é‡Šéƒ¨åˆ†é…ç½®å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®å®é™…æƒ…å†µä¿®æ”¹</font></p>
<h4 id="docker-cli">Docker CLI</h4>
<pre><code class="language-dockerfile">docker-compose up --build -d
</code></pre>
<h4 id="defaultconf">default.conf</h4>
<pre><code class="language-dsconfig">server {
    listen       5173; # é…ç½®ç«¯å£
    server_name  0.0.0.0; # ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºdockeræœåŠ¡å®¿ä¸»æœºçš„ip 
  
    # è®¾ç½®å…è®¸çš„æœ€å¤§è¯·æ±‚ä½“å¤§å°ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ 100MBï¼‰
    client_max_body_size 100M;
 
    location / {
        root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
        index  index.html index.htm;
        try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html =404;
    }
  
    location /api {
        proxy_pass http://backend:5235;  # Docker å†…éƒ¨ç½‘ç»œ
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
    }
 
    error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
    location = /50x.html {
        root   html;
    }
}
</code></pre>
<h4 id="docker-compose">Docker Compose</h4>
<pre><code class="language-yaml">version: '3.8'

services:
  frontend:
    build:
      context: ./sharp-ico-vue   # æŒ‡å‘å‰ç«¯ç›®å½•
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    ports:
      - "5173:5173"               # å‰ç«¯æ˜ å°„åˆ°å®¿ä¸»æœºçš„5173ç«¯å£
    depends_on:
      - backend

  backend:
    build:
      context: .    # æŒ‡å‘åç«¯ç›®å½•
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    ports:
      - "5235:5235"            # åç«¯ç«¯å£
</code></pre>
<h3 id="æ‰‹åŠ¨éƒ¨ç½²">æ‰‹åŠ¨éƒ¨ç½²</h3>
<h4 id="clone">clone</h4>
<p><code>git clone https://github.com/ZyPLJ/SharpIcoWeb.git</code></p>
<h4 id="åç«¯è¿è¡Œ">åç«¯è¿è¡Œ</h4>
<pre><code>cd SharpIcoWeb

dotnet build -c Release

dotnet run
</code></pre>
<h4 id="å‰ç«¯è¿è¡Œ">å‰ç«¯è¿è¡Œ</h4>
<pre><code class="language-bash">cd ..

cd sharp-ico-vue

npm install

npm run dev
</code></pre>
<h2 id="å¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨">ğŸ‘€å¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨</h2>
<p>å‰åç«¯é¡¹ç›®è¿è¡Œæˆ–éƒ¨ç½²åï¼Œæ‰“å¼€è¿è¡Œåç½‘å€ã€‚</p>
<p>é€‰æ‹©éœ€è¦ç”Ÿæˆçš„ICOå›¾è¡¨å°ºå¯¸ï¼Œå¯å¤šé€‰</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3091176/202506/3091176-20250630144434633-1774716702.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»è½¬æ¢ã€‚</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3091176/202506/3091176-20250630144443391-811153464.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="-å¼€å‘æŒ‡å—">ğŸ›  å¼€å‘æŒ‡å—</h2>
<h3 id="é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„">é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„</h3>
<pre><code>sharp-ico/
â”œâ”€â”€ SharpIco/               # å›¾æ ‡è½¬æ¢ç±»åº“  
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ SharpIco.csproj
â”œâ”€â”€ SharpIcoWeb/            # åç«¯Apié¡¹ç›®
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ SharpIcoWeb.csproj
â”œâ”€â”€ sharp-ico-vue           # å‰ç«¯é¡¹ç›®
</code></pre>
<h3 id="å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒ">å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒ</h3>
<ul>
<li>.Net 9</li>
<li>Node.js 20.19+</li>
<li>Vue3</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="è¿è¡Œé¡¹ç›®">è¿è¡Œé¡¹ç›®</h3>
<h4 id="åç«¯">åç«¯</h4>
<pre><code class="language-bash">dotnet build -c Release

dotnet run
</code></pre>
<h4 id="å‰ç«¯">å‰ç«¯</h4>
<pre><code class="language-bash">npm install

npm run dev
</code></pre>
